test_message: Research and create outreach for Acme Corp (acme.com) - B2B SaaS company

delegated_tasks.task: Conduct ICP qualification, technographic research, and buying committee mapping for Acme Corp in the B2B SaaS sector.
Develop and execute email outreach and LinkedIn campaigns targeting decision-makers at Acme Corp according to findings from the Research Manager.
Track engagement with Acme Corp, coordinate follow-up sequences, and ensure CRM sync.

result.summary: Coordinated research and outreach tasks for Acme Corp in the B2B SaaS industry to target decision-makers effectively.
